Example
-----------------------------------

For Android
----------------------------
RequestBuilder obj = new RequestBuilder();
ConfigForAndroid config = new  ConfigForAndroid();
config.ApplicationID = "";
config.Icon = "";
config.Sound = "";
config.Priority = "";
config.Title = "";
config.TitleBody = "";
config.ToID = ""; // User Token or topics;


For IOS
----------------------------
RequestBuilder obj = new RequestBuilder();
ConfigForIOS config = new  ConfigForIOS();
config.ApplicationID = "";
config.Icon = "";
config.Sound = "";
config.Priority = "";
config.Title = "";
config.TitleBody = "";
config.ToID = ""; // User Token or topics;
